findings.title: 아레스 파일을 1입으을 명인에 성적으을 수정어야 알습가 수정어야
findings.description: The unlock process may not proceed normally when the token type is 1 due to improper implementation of _ERC20#getUnLockCount() that does not consider the case where the token type is 1.

findings.title: Issuing Tokens with Non-Existent TokenType
findings.description: Tokens can be issued with a non-existent token type.

findings.title: 아밀 구러 1 으로 , unlock 성가의 실제을 수정합됩
findings.description: The implementation of _ERC20#_getUnLockCount() does not properly consider the case where the token type is 1, resulting in the third unlock (when _ERC20#lockInfo.remainUnLockCount_ is 4) requiring two months to pass instead of one.

findings.title: Issuing Tokens with Non-Existent Token Type
findings.description: The implementation of _ERC20#_getUnLockCount() does not properly consider token type 1, causing unlock processes to fail.
The Ownable contract has an unused operator role which is not utilized anywhere.
